title: Nightmare
description: In the shadowed streets of Archer City, deathâ€™s whisper winds through the alleys and Marcus stands at the epicenter. He alone has the power to get past the shield and face Havoc, but to use that power he has to become the embodiment of his worst nightmares. Uncertain of what comes after, Marcus must wield nightmares against Havoc who fears nothing.Haunted by the dead in his wake,bound by the oaths he has made,and wracked with grief,Marcus must act.Darkness looms. Death whispers. It all comes down to this.One way or another, it all ends here.Dive into the thrilling conclusion where every shadow could be an enemy, and every choice could be the last. Will Marcus summon the fortitude to overcome the darkness, or will the shadows claim their victory?
author: R.L.  Harris
